Hymn.English: 2 Lead me to the rock that is higher than I
3 For You have been a shelter for me, A strong tower from the enemy.

Hymn.Arabic: لأنك أنت يا الله استمعت صلاتي، أعطيت ميراثًا للذين يرهبون اسمك. هلليلويا "
Hymn.English: 5 For You, O God, have heard my vows; You have given me the heritage of those who fear Your name.
